amendment.description: Amendment strikes all after the resolving clause and inserts a complete new text.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the text of the bill after the enacting clause and replace it with a completely new text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
